TOOLTIPS.CLOSE_MENU: サイドメニューを閉じる
TOOLTIPS.OPEN_MENU: サイドメニューを開く
TOOLTIPS.SHORTCUTS: ショートカットの表示
TOOLTIPS.SAVE_MAP_WITH_NAME: 名前を付けてマップを保存
TOOLTIPS.EDIT_NODE: Allows to edit the text of the node
TOOLTIPS.NODE_IMAGE: Adds an image to the node
TOOLTIPS.BOLD_TEXT: Changes the weight of the text
TOOLTIPS.ITALIC_TEXT: Changes the style of the text
TOOLTIPS.TEXT_SIZE: Changes the size of the text and the node
TOOLTIPS.IMAGE_SIZE: Changes the size of the node image
TOOLTIPS.ROOT_NODE_NAME_INPUT: Changes the default root node name
TOOLTIPS.CENTER_ON_RESIZING: Centers the map on window resizing
TOOLTIPS.NODE_DRAGGING: Allows to drag the nodes in the map
TOOLTIPS.MAP_ZOOM: マップのズームを許可
TOOLTIPS.FONT_MIN_SIZE: 最小のフォントサイズ
TOOLTIPS.FONT_MAX_SIZE: 最大のフォントサイズ
TOOLTIPS.FONT_INCREMENT: フォントサイズの間隔
TOOLTIPS.FONT_INCREASE: フォントを大きくする
TOOLTIPS.FONT_DECREASE: フォントを小さくする

INFO.DELETED_AT: Mindmap is going to be deleted at:
INFO.DELETE_AFTER_DAYS: Mindmaps will be deleted on this server after {{deleteAfterDays}} days.

INTRODUCTION.APPLICATION_DESCRIPTION: The open-source web application to draw mind maps together.
APPLICATION_PROPERTIES: Share mind maps with others - either by a QR code or by providing the link.
Add images, colors, font properties and links to nodes

SECTIONS.TITLE: Mind maps
SECTIONS.SUBTITLE: teammapper follows the Tony Buzan approach, which uses the evocative power of images and colors to make the memorization of concepts easier, stimulating creativity and mental associations.

CARDS.TITLE: Colors and images
CARDS.CONTENT: Colors and images of mind maps exploit brain characteristics to express concepts in a more effective and lasting way.

CARDS.TITLE: Radial tree
CARDS.CONTENT: Hierarchical structure of mind maps exploits the radial geometry, which is divided on several levels and facilitates concept expressiveness.

CARDS.TITLE: Uses
CARDS.CONTENT: Mind maps are particularly effective to learn or organize ideas, for example in educational or business contexts.

MESSAGES.MAP_DELETION_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete the map?
MESSAGES.JSON_FILE_SIZE_TOO_LARGE: The file is exceeding 1 MB in file size and could cause problems during import. Please reduce the file size e.g. by removing images.
